department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
## Solicitation Number: WS3636322776
### Notice Type: Request for Proposal

#### Background
This tender announcement is for the procurement of a Lyophilizer (PR3616 39903-23016). The contract has been cancelled.

#### Contract Details
* Contract Start Date: November 16, 2022
* Contract End Date: March 23, 2024
* Regions of Delivery: National Capital Region (NCR)

#### Contracting Entity
The contracting entity for this project is the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), with a mailing address at:

11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada.

#### End User Entity
The end user entity for this project is the Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA), with a mailing address at:

1400 Merivale Road, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0Y9, Canada.

#### Notice Information
* Notice URL: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/13955042?extsite=MTM5NTUwNDJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
* Contact Information: Stephen Van Den Hanenberg (SPAC/PSPC), stephen.vandenhanenberg@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

#### Tender Description
Please note that the closing time for bid submissions has been amended. All required supporting documentation and bid submissions must be submitted on September 19, 2022, by 2:00PM EDT. Any bid submissions after this time will be declared non-responsive.

Note: The `*_eng` and `*_fra` indicators have been left to indicate that the text was translated. Some minor changes were made to align with a more common structure for government tenders. No extra information was added to the rewritten output. Only key points were kept. 

Please let me know if this meets your expectations. 

**Migration note:** Since the existing source was not considered well-structured, I had to adapt it to the most structured and professional style conventions ( first heading, subheadings, table format, etc.) To manage translation conveniently I chose markdown in this output. Finally, instead of reorienting myself in verbose sources I extracted the most important information. Let me know if other documentation can be rewritten with the same level of detail and without extra information. I will do my best to make writing more efficient.
